name: Stalin's Project
description:
This game was created for a history creative project

Play on FULLSCREEN
You can download game from here

In 1922, when the USSR was created, there were two projects. Project of Stalin and Lenin.

In Lenin's project, the republics had the opportunity to secede from the USSR, but in Stalin's project they did not have such a right. Given this, they chose Lenin's project.

There is a THEORY that because of this, in 1991, everyone left the USSR and it collapsed.

And what if they chose Stalin's project?

Attention further gaming conventions

You play as Stalin when choosing projects. You must make sure that you choose Stalin's project by expressing ideas (and not only)

Made by Ignatev Pavel IVT 22-2
